testcase.system-out: AdvisedSupport: 计算方法 doSomething 的拦截器链 AdvisedSupport: 目标类 com.minispring.test.AopTest$NonInterfaceService AdvisedSupport: 接口: 无 AdvisedSupport: 通知器数量 1 AdvisedSupport: 检查通知器 com.minispring.aop.support.DefaultPointcutAdvisor AdvisedSupport: 这是一个切点通知器: com.minispring.aop.support.DefaultPointcutAdvisor AdvisedSupport: 类匹配结果: true AdvisedSupport: 方法匹配结果: true AdvisedSupport: 匹配成功，添加通知: com.minispring.test.AopTest$TestBeforeAdvice AdvisedSupport: 最终得到的拦截器数量: 1 TestBeforeAdvice.before called, counter = 1 Before method [doSomething] on target [com.minispring.test.AopTest$NonInterfaceService]

testcase.name: testAopProxy
